path_get_kind: Paths can be either smooth or straight (a smooth path calculates a curved path around the defining points, whereas a straight path just goes straight from one point to another). This function can be used to find out whether the given path is smooth (true) or not (false).
The index of the path to check.
This will set the "path_kind" variable to <tt>true</tt> or <tt>false</tt> depending on the kind of path the given path index is.
